name: reskins-bobs
title: Artisanal Reskins: Bob's Mods
author: Kirazy
description: [BETA] Reskins items, entities, and structures within Bob's mods to add tier coloring with player-customizable colors, high resolution icons, artisanal, hand crafted color masks, and other improvements. Part of the Artisanal Reskins series. May be used with ShinyBobsGFX and ShinyAngelGFX.
